feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [SBG3][Network] - Network equipment version reload S356B01
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 3, 00:00 - 01:00 UTC

Nov 20, 02:57 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 03/11/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2024 01:00 UTC
Service impact : Network bandwidth reduction for customers with LACP (Link Aggregation Control Protocol) activated.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

entry.content:
Nov 19, 16:33 UTC

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 19/11/2024 15:39 UTC
End time : 19/11/2024 16:00 UTC

Root cause : https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/0lcsqwrwgggz
Ongoing actions : We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
